thread.title: Re: ‘Very lucky John McCain’s not in charge’: Rand Paul BLASTS McCain over Trump criticism
thread.title_full: Re: ‘Very lucky John McCain’s not in charge’: Rand Paul BLASTS McCain over Trump criticism

author: HiltonHead_Dude
title: Re: ‘Very lucky John McCain’s not in charge’: Rand Paul BLASTS McCain over Trump criticism
text:
‘Very lucky John McCain’s not in charge’: Rand Paul BLASTS McCain over Trump criticism Posted at 5:04   Jacob B.   
Sen. Rand Paul will apparently not be the chapter president of Sen. John McCain’s fan club. He tore into the Arizona senator while a guest on ABC’s “This Week,” saying that his critical comments stem from his disagreement with President Trump. He also took a sharp jab at McCain’s leadership qualities. 
Watch: MUST WATCH: Rand Paul defends Trump and slams John McCain, "we're very lucky John McCain's not in charge" #SundayMorning pic.twitter.com/aX8g6DbbzN 
— Asa J 🇺🇸 (@asamjulian)   
He continued by ripping into McCain’s foreign policy philosophy. . @RandPaul : On foreign policy, Sen. John McCain "has been wrong on just about everything over the last four decades." #ThisWeek pic.twitter.com/9e50XXrRLF 
— ABC News Politics (@ABCPolitics) February 19, 2017 
Clearly Senate majority leader Mitch McConnell has his work cut out in keeping the entire Republican conference focused on policy initiatives.
